00089 FileSelectParams* ED_fileselect_get_params(struct SpaceFile *sfile)
00090 {
00091     if (!sfile->params) {
00092         ED_fileselect_set_params(sfile);
00093     }
00094     return sfile->params;
00095 }
00096 
00097 short ED_fileselect_set_params(SpaceFile *sfile)
00098 {
00099     FileSelectParams *params;
00100     wmOperator *op = sfile->op;
00101 
00102     /* create new parameters if necessary */
00103     if (!sfile->params) {
00104         sfile->params= MEM_callocN(sizeof(FileSelectParams), "fileselparams");
00105         /* set path to most recently opened .blend */
00106         BLI_split_dirfile(G.main->name, sfile->params->dir, sfile->params->file, sizeof(sfile->params->dir), sizeof(sfile->params->file));
00107         sfile->params->filter_glob[0] = '\0';
00108     }
00109 
00110     params = sfile->params;
00111 
00112     /* set the parameters from the operator, if it exists */
00113     if (op) {
00114         const short is_files= (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "files") != NULL);
00115         const short is_filepath= (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filepath") != NULL);
00116         const short is_filename= (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filename") != NULL);
00117         const short is_directory= (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "directory") != NULL);
00118         const short is_relative_path= (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "relative_path") != NULL);
00119 
00120         BLI_strncpy(params->title, RNA_struct_ui_name(op->type->srna), sizeof(params->title));
00121 
00122         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filemode"))
00123             params->type = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "filemode");
00124         else
00125             params->type = FILE_SPECIAL;
00126 
00127         if (is_filepath && RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath")) {
00128             char name[FILE_MAX];
00129             RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", name);
00130             if (params->type == FILE_LOADLIB) {
00131                 BLI_strncpy(params->dir, name, sizeof(params->dir));
00132                 sfile->params->file[0]= '\0';
00133             }
00134             else {
00135                 BLI_split_dirfile(name, sfile->params->dir, sfile->params->file, sizeof(sfile->params->dir), sizeof(sfile->params->file));
00136             }
00137         }
00138         else {
00139             if (is_directory && RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "directory")) {
00140                 RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "directory", params->dir);
00141                 sfile->params->file[0]= '\0';
00142             }
00143 
00144             if (is_filename && RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filename")) {
00145                 RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filename", params->file);
00146             }
00147         }
00148 
00149         if (params->dir[0]) {
00150             BLI_cleanup_dir(G.main->name, params->dir);
00151             BLI_path_abs(params->dir, G.main->name);
00152         }
00153 
00154         if (is_directory==TRUE && is_filename==FALSE && is_filepath==FALSE && is_files==FALSE) {
00155             params->flag |= FILE_DIRSEL_ONLY;
00156         }
00157         else {
00158             params->flag &= ~FILE_DIRSEL_ONLY;
00159         }
00160 
00161         params->filter = 0;
00162         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filter_blender"))
00163             params->filter |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "filter_blender") ? BLENDERFILE : 0;
00164         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filter_image"))
00165             params->filter |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "filter_image") ? IMAGEFILE : 0;
00166         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filter_movie"))
00167             params->filter |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "filter_movie") ? MOVIEFILE : 0;
00168         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filter_text"))
00169             params->filter |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "filter_text") ? TEXTFILE : 0;
00170         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filter_python"))
00171             params->filter |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "filter_python") ? PYSCRIPTFILE : 0;
00172         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filter_font"))
00173             params->filter |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "filter_font") ? FTFONTFILE : 0;
00174         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filter_sound"))
00175             params->filter |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "filter_sound") ? SOUNDFILE : 0;
00176         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filter_text"))
00177             params->filter |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "filter_text") ? TEXTFILE : 0;
00178         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filter_folder"))
00179             params->filter |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "filter_folder") ? FOLDERFILE : 0;
00180         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filter_btx"))
00181             params->filter |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "filter_btx") ? BTXFILE : 0;
00182         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filter_collada"))
00183             params->filter |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "filter_collada") ? COLLADAFILE : 0;
00184         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filter_glob")) {
00185             RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filter_glob", params->filter_glob);
00186             params->filter |= (OPERATORFILE|FOLDERFILE);
00187         }
00188         else {
00189             params->filter_glob[0] = '\0';
00190         }
00191 
00192         if (params->filter != 0) {
00193             if (U.uiflag & USER_FILTERFILEEXTS) {
00194                 params->flag |= FILE_FILTER;
00195             }
00196             else {
00197                 params->flag &= ~FILE_FILTER;
00198             }
00199         }
00200 
00201         if (U.uiflag & USER_HIDE_DOT) {
00202             params->flag |= FILE_HIDE_DOT;
00203         }
00204         else {
00205             params->flag &= ~FILE_HIDE_DOT;
00206         }
00207         
00208 
00209         if (params->type == FILE_LOADLIB) {
00210             params->flag |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "link") ? FILE_LINK : 0;
00211             params->flag |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "autoselect") ? FILE_AUTOSELECT : 0;
00212             params->flag |= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "active_layer") ? FILE_ACTIVELAY : 0;
00213         }
00214 
00215         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "display_type"))
00216             params->display= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "display_type");
00217 
00218         if (params->display==FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY) {
00219             if (U.uiflag & USER_SHOW_THUMBNAILS) {
00220                 if (params->filter & (IMAGEFILE|MOVIEFILE))
00221                     params->display= FILE_IMGDISPLAY;
00222                 else
00223                     params->display= FILE_SHORTDISPLAY;
00224             }
00225             else {
00226                 params->display= FILE_SHORTDISPLAY;
00227             }
00228         }
00229 
00230         if (is_relative_path) {
00231             if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "relative_path")) {
00232                 RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "relative_path", U.flag & USER_RELPATHS);
00233             }
00234         }
00235     }
00236     else {
00237         /* default values, if no operator */
00238         params->type = FILE_UNIX;
00239         params->flag |= FILE_HIDE_DOT;
00240         params->flag &= ~FILE_DIRSEL_ONLY;
00241         params->display = FILE_SHORTDISPLAY;
00242         params->filter = 0;
00243         params->filter_glob[0] = '\0';
00244         params->sort = FILE_SORT_ALPHA;
00245     }
00246 
00247 
00248     /* initialize the list with previous folders */
00249     if (!sfile->folders_prev)
00250         sfile->folders_prev = folderlist_new();
00251     folderlist_pushdir(sfile->folders_prev, sfile->params->dir);
00252 
00253     /* switching thumbnails needs to recalc layout [#28809] */
00254     if (sfile->layout) {
00255         sfile->layout->dirty= TRUE;
00256     }
00257 
00258     return 1;
00259 }
00260 
00261 void ED_fileselect_reset_params(SpaceFile *sfile)
00262 {
00263     sfile->params->type = FILE_UNIX;
00264     sfile->params->flag = 0;
00265     sfile->params->title[0] = '\0';
00266 }
00267 
00268 int ED_fileselect_layout_numfiles(FileLayout* layout, struct ARegion *ar)
00269 {
00270     int numfiles;
00271 
00272     if (layout->flag & FILE_LAYOUT_HOR) {
00273         int width = (int)(ar->v2d.cur.xmax - ar->v2d.cur.xmin - 2*layout->tile_border_x);
00274         numfiles = (int)((float)width / (float)layout->tile_w + 0.5f);
00275         return numfiles*layout->rows;
00276     }
00277     else {
00278         int height = (int)(ar->v2d.cur.ymax - ar->v2d.cur.ymin - 2*layout->tile_border_y);
00279         numfiles = (int)((float)height/(float)layout->tile_h + 0.5f);
00280         return numfiles*layout->columns;
00281     }
00282 }
00283 
00284 static int is_inside(int x, int y, int cols, int rows)
00285 {
00286     return ( (x >= 0) && (x<cols) && (y>=0) && (y<rows) );
00287 }
00288 
00289 FileSelection ED_fileselect_layout_offset_rect(FileLayout* layout, const rcti* rect)
00290 {
00291     int colmin, colmax, rowmin, rowmax;
00292     FileSelection sel;
00293     sel.first = sel.last = -1;
00294 
00295     if (layout == NULL)
00296         return sel;
00297     
00298     colmin = (rect->xmin)/(layout->tile_w + 2*layout->tile_border_x);
00299     rowmin = (rect->ymin)/(layout->tile_h + 2*layout->tile_border_y);
00300     colmax = (rect->xmax)/(layout->tile_w + 2*layout->tile_border_x);
00301     rowmax = (rect->ymax)/(layout->tile_h + 2*layout->tile_border_y);
00302     
00303     if ( is_inside(colmin, rowmin, layout->columns, layout->rows) || 
00304          is_inside(colmax, rowmax, layout->columns, layout->rows) ) {
00305         CLAMP(colmin, 0, layout->columns-1);
00306         CLAMP(rowmin, 0, layout->rows-1);
00307         CLAMP(colmax, 0, layout->columns-1);
00308         CLAMP(rowmax, 0, layout->rows-1);
00309     } 
00310     
00311     if ((colmin > layout->columns-1) || (rowmin > layout->rows-1)) {
00312         sel.first = -1;
00313     }
00314     else {
00315         if (layout->flag & FILE_LAYOUT_HOR) 
00316             sel.first = layout->rows*colmin + rowmin;
00317         else
00318             sel.first = colmin + layout->columns*rowmin;
00319     }
00320     if ((colmax > layout->columns-1) || (rowmax > layout->rows-1)) {
00321         sel.last = -1;
00322     }
00323     else {
00324         if (layout->flag & FILE_LAYOUT_HOR) 
00325             sel.last = layout->rows*colmax + rowmax;
00326         else
00327             sel.last = colmax + layout->columns*rowmax;
00328     }
00329 
00330     return sel;
00331 }
00332 
00333 int ED_fileselect_layout_offset(FileLayout* layout, int x, int y)
00334 {
00335     int offsetx, offsety;
00336     int active_file;
00337 
00338     if (layout == NULL)
00339         return -1;
00340     
00341     offsetx = (x)/(layout->tile_w + 2*layout->tile_border_x);
00342     offsety = (y)/(layout->tile_h + 2*layout->tile_border_y);
00343     
00344     if (offsetx > layout->columns - 1) return -1;
00345     if (offsety > layout->rows - 1) return -1;
00346     
00347     if (layout->flag & FILE_LAYOUT_HOR) 
00348         active_file = layout->rows*offsetx + offsety;
00349     else
00350         active_file = offsetx + layout->columns*offsety;
00351     return active_file;
00352 }
00353 
00354 void ED_fileselect_layout_tilepos(FileLayout* layout, int tile, int *x, int *y)
00355 {
00356     if (layout->flag == FILE_LAYOUT_HOR) {
00357         *x = layout->tile_border_x + (tile/layout->rows)*(layout->tile_w+2*layout->tile_border_x);
00358         *y = layout->tile_border_y + (tile%layout->rows)*(layout->tile_h+2*layout->tile_border_y);
00359     }
00360     else {
00361         *x = layout->tile_border_x + ((tile)%layout->columns)*(layout->tile_w+2*layout->tile_border_x);
00362         *y = layout->tile_border_y + ((tile)/layout->columns)*(layout->tile_h+2*layout->tile_border_y);
00363     }
00364 }
00365 
00366 /* Shorten a string to a given width w. 
00367  * If front is set, shorten from the front,
00368  * otherwise shorten from the end. */
00369 float file_shorten_string(char* string, float w, int front)
00370 {   
00371     char temp[FILE_MAX];
00372     short shortened = 0;
00373     float sw = 0;
00374     float pad = 0;
00375 
00376     if (w <= 0) {
00377         *string = '\0';
00378         return 0.0;
00379     }
00380 
00381     sw = file_string_width(string);
00382     if (front == 1) {
00383         char *s = string;
00384         BLI_strncpy(temp, "...", 4);
00385         pad = file_string_width(temp);
00386         while ((*s) && (sw+pad>w)) {
00387             s++;
00388             sw = file_string_width(s);
00389             shortened = 1;
00390         }
00391         if (shortened) {
00392             int slen = strlen(s);
00393             BLI_strncpy(temp+3, s, slen+1);
00394             temp[slen+4] = '\0';
00395             BLI_strncpy(string, temp, slen+4);
00396         }
00397     }
00398     else {
00399         char *s = string;
00400         while (sw>w) {
00401             int slen = strlen(string);
00402             string[slen-1] = '\0';
00403             sw = file_string_width(s);
00404             shortened = 1;
00405         }
00406 
00407         if (shortened) {
00408             int slen = strlen(string);
00409             if (slen > 3) {
00410                 BLI_strncpy(string+slen-3, "...", 4);
00411             }
00412         }
00413     }
00414     
00415     return sw;
00416 }
00417 
00418 float file_string_width(const char* str)
00419 {
00420     uiStyle *style= UI_GetStyle();
00421     uiStyleFontSet(&style->widget);
00422     return BLF_width(style->widget.uifont_id, str);
00423 }
00424 
00425 float file_font_pointsize(void)
00426 {
00427 #if 0
00428     float s;
00429     char tmp[2] = "X";
00430     uiStyle *style= UI_GetStyle();
00431     uiStyleFontSet(&style->widget);
00432     s = BLF_height(style->widget.uifont_id, tmp);
00433     return style->widget.points;
00434 #else
00435     uiStyle *style= UI_GetStyle();
00436     uiStyleFontSet(&style->widget);
00437     return style->widget.points * UI_DPI_FAC;
00438 #endif
00439 }

00441 static void column_widths(struct FileList* files, struct FileLayout* layout)
00442 {
00443     int i;
00444     int numfiles = filelist_numfiles(files);
00445 
00446     for (i=0; i<MAX_FILE_COLUMN; ++i) {
00447         layout->column_widths[i] = 0;
00448     }
00449 
00450     for (i=0; (i < numfiles); ++i)
00451     {
00452         struct direntry* file = filelist_file(files, i);    
00453         if (file) {
00454             float len;
00455             len = file_string_width(file->relname);
00456             if (len > layout->column_widths[COLUMN_NAME]) layout->column_widths[COLUMN_NAME] = len;
00457             len = file_string_width(file->date);
00458             if (len > layout->column_widths[COLUMN_DATE]) layout->column_widths[COLUMN_DATE] = len;
00459             len = file_string_width(file->time);
00460             if (len > layout->column_widths[COLUMN_TIME]) layout->column_widths[COLUMN_TIME] = len;
00461             len = file_string_width(file->size);
00462             if (len > layout->column_widths[COLUMN_SIZE]) layout->column_widths[COLUMN_SIZE] = len;
00463             len = file_string_width(file->mode1);
00464             if (len > layout->column_widths[COLUMN_MODE1]) layout->column_widths[COLUMN_MODE1] = len;
00465             len = file_string_width(file->mode2);
00466             if (len > layout->column_widths[COLUMN_MODE2]) layout->column_widths[COLUMN_MODE2] = len;
00467             len = file_string_width(file->mode3);
00468             if (len > layout->column_widths[COLUMN_MODE3]) layout->column_widths[COLUMN_MODE3] = len;
00469             len = file_string_width(file->owner);
00470             if (len > layout->column_widths[COLUMN_OWNER]) layout->column_widths[COLUMN_OWNER] = len;
00471         }
00472     }
00473 }
00474 
00475 void ED_fileselect_init_layout(struct SpaceFile *sfile, struct ARegion *ar)
00476 {
00477     FileSelectParams *params = ED_fileselect_get_params(sfile);
00478     FileLayout *layout= NULL;
00479     View2D *v2d= &ar->v2d;
00480     int maxlen = 0;
00481     int numfiles;
00482     int textheight;
00483 
00484     if (sfile->layout == NULL) {
00485         sfile->layout = MEM_callocN(sizeof(struct FileLayout), "file_layout");
00486         sfile->layout->dirty = TRUE;
00487     }
00488     else if (sfile->layout->dirty == FALSE) {
00489         return;
00490     }
00491 
00492     numfiles = filelist_numfiles(sfile->files);
00493     textheight = (int)file_font_pointsize();
00494     layout = sfile->layout;
00495     layout->textheight = textheight;
00496 
00497     if (params->display == FILE_IMGDISPLAY) {
00498         layout->prv_w = 96;
00499         layout->prv_h = 96;
00500         layout->tile_border_x = 6;
00501         layout->tile_border_y = 6;
00502         layout->prv_border_x = 6;
00503         layout->prv_border_y = 6;
00504         layout->tile_w = layout->prv_w + 2*layout->prv_border_x;
00505         layout->tile_h = layout->prv_h + 2*layout->prv_border_y + textheight;
00506         layout->width= (int)(v2d->cur.xmax - v2d->cur.xmin - 2*layout->tile_border_x);
00507         layout->columns= layout->width / (layout->tile_w + 2*layout->tile_border_x);
00508         if (layout->columns > 0)
00509             layout->rows= numfiles/layout->columns + 1; // XXX dirty, modulo is zero
00510         else {
00511             layout->columns = 1;
00512             layout->rows= numfiles + 1; // XXX dirty, modulo is zero
00513         }
00514         layout->height= sfile->layout->rows*(layout->tile_h+2*layout->tile_border_y) + layout->tile_border_y*2;
00515         layout->flag = FILE_LAYOUT_VER;
00516     }
00517     else {
00518         layout->prv_w = 0;
00519         layout->prv_h = 0;
00520         layout->tile_border_x = 8;
00521         layout->tile_border_y = 2;
00522         layout->prv_border_x = 0;
00523         layout->prv_border_y = 0;
00524         layout->tile_h = textheight*3/2;
00525         layout->height= (int)(v2d->cur.ymax - v2d->cur.ymin - 2*layout->tile_border_y);
00526         layout->rows = layout->height / (layout->tile_h + 2*layout->tile_border_y);
00527 
00528         column_widths(sfile->files, layout);
00529 
00530         if (params->display == FILE_SHORTDISPLAY) {
00531             maxlen = ICON_DEFAULT_WIDTH_SCALE + 4 +
00532                      (int)layout->column_widths[COLUMN_NAME] + 12 +
00533                      (int)layout->column_widths[COLUMN_SIZE] + 12;
00534         }
00535         else {
00536             maxlen = ICON_DEFAULT_WIDTH_SCALE + 4 +
00537                      (int)layout->column_widths[COLUMN_NAME] + 12 +
00538 #ifndef WIN32
00539                      (int)layout->column_widths[COLUMN_MODE1] + 12 +
00540                      (int)layout->column_widths[COLUMN_MODE2] + 12 +
00541                      (int)layout->column_widths[COLUMN_MODE3] + 12 +
00542                      (int)layout->column_widths[COLUMN_OWNER] + 12 +
00543 #endif
00544                      (int)layout->column_widths[COLUMN_DATE] + 12 +
00545                      (int)layout->column_widths[COLUMN_TIME] + 12 +
00546                      (int)layout->column_widths[COLUMN_SIZE] + 12;
00547 
00548         }
00549         layout->tile_w = maxlen;
00550         if (layout->rows > 0)
00551             layout->columns = numfiles/layout->rows + 1; // XXX dirty, modulo is zero
00552         else {
00553             layout->rows = 1;
00554             layout->columns = numfiles + 1; // XXX dirty, modulo is zero
00555         }
00556         layout->width = sfile->layout->columns * (layout->tile_w + 2*layout->tile_border_x) + layout->tile_border_x*2;
00557         layout->flag = FILE_LAYOUT_HOR;
00558     }
00559     layout->dirty= FALSE;
00560 }
00561 
00562 FileLayout* ED_fileselect_get_layout(struct SpaceFile *sfile, struct ARegion *ar)
00563 {
00564     if (!sfile->layout) {
00565         ED_fileselect_init_layout(sfile, ar);
00566     }
00567     return sfile->layout;
00568 }
00569 
00570 void file_change_dir(bContext *C, int checkdir)
00571 {
00572     SpaceFile *sfile= CTX_wm_space_file(C);
00573 
00574     if (sfile->params) {
00575 
00576         ED_fileselect_clear(C, sfile);
00577 
00578         if (checkdir && BLI_is_dir(sfile->params->dir)==0) {
00579             BLI_strncpy(sfile->params->dir, filelist_dir(sfile->files), sizeof(sfile->params->dir));
00580             /* could return but just refresh the current dir */
00581         }
00582         filelist_setdir(sfile->files, sfile->params->dir);
00583         
00584         if (folderlist_clear_next(sfile))
00585             folderlist_free(sfile->folders_next);
00586 
00587         folderlist_pushdir(sfile->folders_prev, sfile->params->dir);
00588 
00589     }
00590 }
00591 
00592 int file_select_match(struct SpaceFile *sfile, const char *pattern)
00593 {
00594     int match = 0;
00595     if (strchr(pattern, '*') || strchr(pattern, '?') || strchr(pattern, '[')) {
00596         int i;
00597         struct direntry *file;
00598         int n = filelist_numfiles(sfile->files);
00599 
00600         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00601             file = filelist_file(sfile->files, i);
00602             if (fnmatch(pattern, file->relname, 0) == 0) {
00603                 file->selflag |= SELECTED_FILE;
00604                 match = 1;
00605             }
00606         }
00607     }
00608     return match;
00609 }
00610 
00611 void autocomplete_directory(struct bContext *C, char *str, void *UNUSED(arg_v))
00612 {
00613     SpaceFile *sfile= CTX_wm_space_file(C);
00614 
00615     /* search if str matches the beginning of name */
00616     if (str[0] && sfile->files) {
00617         char dirname[FILE_MAX];
00618 
00619         DIR *dir;
00620         struct dirent *de;
00621         
00622         BLI_split_dir_part(str, dirname, sizeof(dirname));
00623 
00624         dir = opendir(dirname);
00625 
00626         if (dir) {
00627             AutoComplete *autocpl= autocomplete_begin(str, FILE_MAX);
00628 
00629             while ((de = readdir(dir)) != NULL) {
00630                 if (strcmp(".", de->d_name)==0 || strcmp("..", de->d_name)==0) {
00631                     /* pass */
00632                 }
00633                 else {
00634                     char path[FILE_MAX];
00635                     struct stat status;
00636                     
00637                     BLI_join_dirfile(path, sizeof(path), dirname, de->d_name);
00638 
00639                     if (stat(path, &status) == 0) {
00640                         if (S_ISDIR(status.st_mode)) { /* is subdir */
00641                             autocomplete_do_name(autocpl, path);
00642                         }
00643                     }
00644                 }
00645             }
00646             closedir(dir);
00647 
00648             autocomplete_end(autocpl, str);
00649             if (BLI_exists(str)) {
00650                 BLI_add_slash(str);
00651             }
00652             else {
00653                 BLI_strncpy(sfile->params->dir, str, sizeof(sfile->params->dir));
00654             }
00655         }
00656     }
00657 }
00658 
00659 void autocomplete_file(struct bContext *C, char *str, void *UNUSED(arg_v))
00660 {
00661     SpaceFile *sfile= CTX_wm_space_file(C);
00662 
00663     /* search if str matches the beginning of name */
00664     if (str[0] && sfile->files) {
00665         AutoComplete *autocpl= autocomplete_begin(str, FILE_MAX);
00666         int nentries = filelist_numfiles(sfile->files);
00667         int i;
00668 
00669         for (i= 0; i<nentries; ++i) {
00670             struct direntry* file = filelist_file(sfile->files, i);
00671             if (file && S_ISREG(file->type)) {
00672                 autocomplete_do_name(autocpl, file->relname);
00673             }
00674         }
00675         autocomplete_end(autocpl, str);
00676     }
00677 }
00678 
00679 void ED_fileselect_clear(struct bContext *C, struct SpaceFile *sfile)
00680 {
00681     /* only NULL in rare cases - [#29734] */
00682     if (sfile->files) {
00683         thumbnails_stop(sfile->files, C);
00684         filelist_freelib(sfile->files);
00685         filelist_free(sfile->files);
00686     }
00687 
00688     sfile->params->active_file = -1;
00689     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE|ND_SPACE_FILE_LIST, NULL);
00690 }
00691 
00692 void ED_fileselect_exit(struct bContext *C, struct SpaceFile *sfile)
00693 {
00694     if (!sfile) return;
00695     if (sfile->op) {
00696         WM_event_fileselect_event(C, sfile->op, EVT_FILESELECT_EXTERNAL_CANCEL);
00697         sfile->op = NULL;
00698     }
00699 
00700     folderlist_free(sfile->folders_prev);
00701     folderlist_free(sfile->folders_next);
00702     
00703     if (sfile->files) {
00704         ED_fileselect_clear(C, sfile);
00705         MEM_freeN(sfile->files);
00706         sfile->files= NULL;
00707     }
00708 
00709 }
